TopicTitle: What if the ksc irl is actually 'the' ksc (as in ksp's ksc )

Articles.Content:
This basically means you own NASA and have unlimited funds, astronauts and parts.

I would finish SLS and pull off a moon landing next year.(Seriously, SLS is the coolest rocket I ever know. It's the 'add more boosters' type of rocket, not the 'made reusable to save money' type)

Disclaimer: Starship is also cool, just not as cool as SLS.

Then go to mars.

 

Edited July 15, 2019 by Space Nerd
Install KSPI-E mod, get a full tank of antimatter and sell it to NASA.
Moon base, Mars base, Titan base, Venus base, Europa base, bases everywhere!
